== PSK31 ==

Another digital mode, quickly became popular, and similar to Morse Code in a way. Using Phase Shift Keying, characters are sent in a bit sequence. There is another similar mode, PSK63 (I think), the two are not compatible.

Placeholder, I'll be back.  KB3IMT

=== Available Software ===
Available from the category Amateur Radio in Synaptic.
* Multiple Modes - gmfsk
* Multiple Modes - hf
* Multiple Modes - kptc
* PSK31 - gpsk31 -<nowiki>[[http://www.qsl.net/pg4i/linux/]]</nowiki>

* PSK31 - linpsk - <nowiki>[[http://linpsk.sourceforge.net/]]</nowiki>
* PSK31 - phaseshift - <nowiki>[[http://www.qsl.net/n1vtn/phaseshift.html]]</nowiki>
* PSK31 - psk31lx
* PSK31 - twpsk
